org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class TestHRegionWithInMemoryFlush

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestHRegion
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestHRegionWithInMemoryFlush

  • public class TestHRegionWithInMemoryFlush
extends TestHRegion
    A test similar to TestHRegion, but with in-memory flush families. Also checks wal truncation after in-memory compaction.

    • Nested Class Summary
